text: Magar nadidai, ki Alloh taolo on ciro, ki dar osmonho va on ciro, ki dar zamin ast, medonad? Hec nacvoe mijoni se nafar naʙosad, magar on ki U cahorumini onhost va na mijoni panc nafar, magar on ki U sasumini onhost va na kamtar az in [adad] na ʙestar, magar on ki har kuco ʙosand, U hamrohi onhost. Sipas ruzi qijomat onhoro az on ci kardaand, ʙoxaʙar mesozad. Be gumon, Alloh taolo ʙa hama ciz donost
